document.full_text: two u.s. commercial airline pilots complained in a lawsuit on friday that new screening procedures for flight crews -- scaled back after complaints by pilots -- were still too invasive and violated privacy rights.
document.title: pilots say revised u.s. screening still too invasive
lines_and_colors: two u.s. commercial airline pilots complained in a lawsuit on friday that new screening procedures for flight crews -- scaled back after complaints by pilots -- were still too invasive and violated privacy rights.
